GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS AMPHIBIOUS INFANTRY COMMANDO SCORE UNIQUE_UNIT SKIRMISH_AI_DONT_GARRISON IGNORE_FORCE_MOVE SNIPER CAN_BE_FAVORITE_UNIT PRELOAD PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToIdle") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_ParachuteLaunch" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_toParachuting") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_bored" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end if Prev == "STATE_Parachuting" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_fromParachuting") end

DieMuxData.DeathTypesForbidden: BITTEN ELECTROCUTED LASERED BURNED STABBED IRRADIATED
